text: ──Then, I'll just drop you off at your house.

You didn't have any errands to stop by
the office today, right?

Yes, I'm fine...
but, can I ask for one favor?

I'd like you to drop me off in front of the
department store just down this road.

Yes! I got a notification that the
boutique received new arrivals...

Their displays are always lovely,
so I promised to go see them in person.

I see, Natsuha always has good taste in clothes, huh?
Is that how you're always refining your style?

Hehe, I'm glad you say that,
but I don't think too hard about it, I just enjoy it.

Don't you feel incredibly wonderful
when you find clothes that you think are just perfect?
